attributes.action: Bring senior politicians to court for lying about facts during EU referendum.
attributes.background: The EU referendum has highlighted the serious disenfranchisement of the electorate through the use of false information. Electoral laws are surely there to ensure fair elections and safeguard the interests of the electorate. This petition is launched in response to deliberate misuse of information.

rejection.details: This would be a matter for the police, the Crown Prosecution Service and the courts.
